titles: The traytor A tragedie, vvritten by Iames Shirley. Acted by her Majesties Servants.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed [by John Norton] for William Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop at Furnivals Inne-gate in Holborne,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
